plot: Eleven year old Chitose has the hots for an older man, deluding herself that a reciprocal affection exists. Her obsession puts her at odds with her home room teacher who may or may not actually be her nemesis.
opening_theme: "Chitose Get You! no Uta" by Sayaka Nakaya, Sora Tokui, & MAKO
ending_theme: "Chitose I Love You" (千年-ちとせ-アイラビュー) by Rikako Yamaguchi & Iizuka Mayuu (eps 14-26)
